Verses: 1 andriyum Oru Periya Adaiyaalam Vaanaththile Kaanappattadhu; Oru Sthiree Sooriyanai Anindhirundhaal, Aval Paadhangalin Keezhe Sandhiranum, Aval Sirasinmel Pannirandu Natchaththirangalulla Kireedamum Irundhana.
2 aval Karpavadhiyaayirundhu, Pirasavavedhanaiyadaindhu, Pillaiperumpadi Varuththappattu Alarinaal.
3 appozhudhu Veroru Adaiyaalam Vaanaththile Kaanappattadhu; Ezhu Thalaigalaiyum, Paththuk Kombugalaiyum, Than Thalaigalinmel Ezhu Mudigalaiyumudaiya Sivappaana Periya Valusarppamirundhadhu.

4 adhin Vaal Vaanaththin Natchaththirangalil Moondrilorupangai Izhuththu, Avaigalaip Boomiyil Vizhaththallitru; Pirasavavedhanaippadugira Andha Sthiree Pillaipetravudane, Avaludaiya Pillaiyaip Patchiththuppodumpadikku Andha Valusarppam Avalukku Munbaaga Nindradhu.
5 sagala Jaadhigalaiyum Iruppukkolaal Aalugaiseyyum Aanpillaiyai Petraal; Avaludaiya Pillai Dhevanidaththirkum Avarudaiya Singaasanaththinidaththirkum, Eduththukkollappattadhu.
6 sthireeyaanaval Vanaandharaththirku Odipponaal; Ange Aayiraththirunootrarupadhu Naalalavum Avalaip Poshippadharkaaga Dhevanaal Aayaththamaakkappatta Idam Avalukku Undaayirundhadhu.
7 vaanaththile Yuththamundaayitru; Migaavelum Avanaich Serndha Thoodhargalum Valusarppaththode Yuththampanninaargal; Valusarppamum Adhaiserndha Thoodharum Yuththampanniyum Jeyangollavillai.

9 ulagamanaiththaiyum Mosampokkukira Pisaasu Endrum Saaththaan Endrum Sollappatta Pazhaiya Paampaagiya Periya Valusarppam Thallappattadhu; Adhu Boomiyile Vizhaththallappattadhu, Adhanodekooda Adhaiserndha Thoodharum Thallappattaargal.

10 appozhudhu Vaanaththile Oru Periya Saththamundaagi: Ippozhudhu Ratchippum Vallamaiyum Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Raajyamum, Avarudaiya Kiristhuvin Adhigaaramum Undaayirukkiradhu; Iravum Pagalum Nammudaiya Dhevanukkumunbaaga Nammudaiya Sagodhararmel Kutranj Sumaththumporuttu Avargal Mel Kutranjaattugiravan Thaazhath Thallappattupponaan.
11 maranam Neridugiradhaayirundhaalum Adharkuth Thappumpadi Thangal Jeevanaiyum Paaraamal, Aattukkuttiyin Raththaththinaalum Thangal Saatchiyin Vasanaththinaalum Avanai Jeyiththaargal.

12 aagaiyaal Paralogangale! Avaigalil Vaasamaayirukkiravargale! Kalikoorungal. Boomiyilum Samuththiraththilum Kudiyirukkiravargale! Aiyo, Pisaasaanavan Thanakkuk Konjakkaalamaaththiram Undendru Arindhu, Migundha Kobangondu, Ungalidaththil Iranginapadiyaal, Ungalukku Aabaththuvarum Endru Sollakketten.
13 valusarppamaanadhu Thaan Boomiyile Thallappattadhai Arindhu, Andha Aanpillaiyaippetra Sthireeyaith Dhunbappaduththinadhu.

14 sthireeyaanaval Andhap Paambinmugaththirku Vilagi, Oru Kaalamum, Kaalangalum, Araikkaalamumaagap Poshikkappadaththakkadhaai Vanaandharaththilulla Than Idaththirkup Parandhupogumpadi Perungazhukin Irandu Siragugal Avalukkuk Kodukkappattadhu.
15 appozhudhu Andha Sthireeyai Vellangondupogumpadikkup Paampaanadhu Than Vaayilirundhu Oru Nadhipondra Vellaththai Avalukkup Pinnaaga Ootrivittadhu.
16 boomiyaanadhu Sthireekku Udhaviyaagath Than Vaayaith Thirandhu, Valusarppam Than Vaayilirundhu Ootrina Vellaththai Vizhunginadhu.

17 appozhudhu Valusarppamaanadhu Sthireeyinmel Kobangondu, Dhevanudaiya Karpanaigalaik Kaikkollugiravargalum, Yesukiristhuvaikkuriththuch Saatchiyai Udaiyavargalaagiya Avaludaiya Sandhadhiyaana Matravargaludane Yuththampannappoyitru.
